thread.title: Jeremih Teases New Single With Chris Brown & Big Sean Dropping Friday
thread.title_full: Jeremih Teases New Single With Chris Brown & Big Sean Dropping Friday

author: Kevin Goddard
title: Jeremih Teases New Single With Chris Brown & Big Sean Dropping Friday
text:
Home > Music > Jeremih Teases New Single With Chris Brown & Big Sean Dropping Friday Jeremih Teases New Single With Chris Brown & Big Sean Dropping Friday 0 0 Posted by Kevin Goddard  20pm #UpcomingSingleAlert. 
With exception to Merry X-mas Lil Mama , Jeremih has been relatively quiet since he dropped off his Late Nights: Europe project back in July, but thankfully that’s all about to change come Friday. Today, Jeremih's label, Def Jam Recordings, took to twitter to preview the Chicago crooner's next single “I Think Of You” featuring Chris Brown & Big Sean , who ironically will be releasing his own album I Decided as well. 
The song is set to drop on streaming platforms on Friday (Thursday at midnight to be exact), and it will serve as the first single off Jeremih’s fourth studio album, dropping later in 2017. 
From the clip shared by Def Jam, the song appears to sample Montell Jordan 's 2000 hit " Get It On Tonite ,” which you can hear for yourself below. Take a listen, and be sure to check back tomorrow night at midnight for the release. (Artwork can be seen in the gallery) < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Feb 1, 2017 at 08:20pm 1 View
